title: Relates to stabilizing the cultural education account and the local government records management improvement fund
summary: Relates to stabilizing the cultural education account and the local government records management improvement fund.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, the arts and cultural affairs law, the administrative code of the city of New York and the state finance law, in relation to stabilizing the cultural education account and the local government records management improvement fund
